page.title: 12SPARE TIME
page.content: In my spare time I go to the park, about 5 minutes' walk away, with my friends. Sometimes I go to the beach or swimming baths with my sister 7, brother 10, mum and dad. In the winter I watch television or read books. I also go to the{Girl Guides}every Tuesday. We earn badges and have to learn all the things to do with a particular badge. My spare time on a Sunday is spent tidying my room, or helping dad in the garden, mowing the lawn, cutting the edges of it with shears, brushing up twigs and leaves, or weeding the flower beds. On Thursdays and Saturdays I go shopping with my mum and later I help her put it away. In his spare time my dad goes to his friend's house to practice playing his guitar and singing his songs. Sally Noble aged 11.
